caption.p: Cumulative distribution functions (cdf) of data from 2000–2015 for ( a) AOD, ( b) AE, and ( c) SSA in each region. The cdf for all years is shown in black (labels under lower panel), while the deviation from the mean is shown for each year with the color scheme transitioning from blue (2000) to green (2015) (labels above top panel). ( d) Time series of the yearly seasonal mean extreme AOD for each region. Significant trends in the daily mean values are indicated by a red ‘+’ or ‘−’ in each panel (a–c) for positive and negative trends, respectively, and to the right of each panel in (d).
